Luna Terris -Demo-
-------------

Blas Jean has been sent to a town in the 

outskirts to stop ghouls from rising.

-------------
{Movement}

[Up] pass througn gates.
[Left/Right] arrow keys to move.
[Z] to jump.
[X] to attack.
[Enter] to pause or accept.

A demo, nothing more.
